pages.text: Platypuses are small creatures mostly covered in brown fur, having gray on their bill and webbed feet.$(br2)They are passive creature but you don't want to attack them or you will be poisonned you for 5 seconds.$(br2)Platypus can be bred with Lobster Tails or Cooked Lobster Tails.
You can attract Platypus with Redstone.$(br2)Give them redstone powder or Redstone Blocks to make them find something useful for you in near clay blocks, like Maggots, Clay Balls or even a Fedora.
